snippet: Under the deal between lawmakers and Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, part of a budget cut will be restored if there is no other way to avoid reducing reimbursement rates for nonprofit providers for people with developmental disabilities.
lead_paragraph: Under the deal between lawmakers and Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, part of a budget cut will be restored if there is no other way to avoid reducing reimbursement rates for nonprofit providers for people with developmental disabilities.

headline.main: Cuomo Agrees Not to Lower Pay Rates for Groups That Serve Disabled
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Agrees Not to Lower Pay Rates for Serving Disabled
